name: Web Check
short_description: All-in-one website analysis tool - SSL, DNS, headers, performance, and security checks.
description: Web Check is a comprehensive web analysis tool that provides detailed insights into any website. It performs over 30 different checks including SSL certificate validation, DNS records analysis, HTTP headers inspection, WHOIS lookup, tech stack detection (CMS, frameworks, analytics), server location and performance metrics, security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options), open ports, domain age, and social media metadata. Perfect for web developers, security researchers, or anyone wanting detailed info about a website - all self-hosted with no third-party API dependencies.
usecases: Analyze SSL certificate details and expiration dates.
Check what technologies a website is built with.
Verify security headers are properly configured.
Get detailed DNS and WHOIS information for any domain.
notes: Runs 30+ checks on any URL you provide
All analysis done locally - no data sent to third parties
